title: Gods of Ancient Egypt
description: A study of the gods and goddesses of ancient Egypt. The book takes the form of a gazatteer with separate entries for each of the major deities, details of relevant mythology, characteristics of the God and details of sanctuaries and places with which they were associated. Lavishly illustrated with colour photographs and written in an engaging style. First published in 1984 and now back in print.
author: Barbara Watterson
